title: Maldives Villa Luxury with Seaplane Transfers, Daily Dining & Nightly Free-Flow Drinks
description: Experience an exotic paradise of palm-fringed white sands and aquamarine lagoons, staying in barefoot luxury at Kanuhura resort - a serene and intimate haven spread across three private islands. Your escape begins with a spectacular seaplane journey to the resort from Malé, with included access to the Kanuhura Seaplane Lounge, before you cast your shoes aside for unadulterated bliss in a beautiful villa with daily dining (daily breakfast, lunch and dinner) and a nightly two-hour drinks package.

title: Overwater Maldives Luxury - All-Inclusive Dining and Seaplane Transfers Included
description: Experience an exotic paradise of palm-fringed white sands and aquamarine lagoons, staying in barefoot luxury at the Kanuhura resort - a serene and intimate haven across three private islands. Your escape begins with a spectacular seaplane journey to the resort from Male (included in your package), before you cast your shoes aside for a week of unadulterated bliss in a beautiful overwater villa with daily breakfast, lunch and dinner included, plus two drinks each with meals and an unforgettable sunset cruise aboard a traditional wooden Dhoni boat with canapes and sparkling wine.

title: Maldives Private Island Beachfront and Overwater Villas with Six Eateries, Renowned Spa & Infinity Pool
description: Welcome to heaven on earth - Six Senses Kanuhura, a private island resort boasting aquamarine lagoons and pristine white sands, bright blue skies melting into the ocean, and palm trees swaying to a pleasant tropical breeze. Soundtracked by the soothing sounds of the ocean, discover absolute seclusion and fun-filled adventure with an escape to the land of barefoot-style luxury. Slip further into relaxation mode with a restorative wrap or massage at the resort’s renowned spa, and watch as the sun dips below the oceanic horizon over a bite of sizzling fresh-caught reef fish at Drift, or savour wine and tapas from the best seat in the house on the northern tip of Kanuhura - The Point.
